alert.note: Alert for Delta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 3:19PM EST until December 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate snow and considerable blowing snow expected. Two-day total snow accumulations Friday through Saturday will range from around two inches at Escanaba to near 12 inches along a line from Rock to Steuben. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Delta County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 1 AM Friday to 7 PM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult for some locations Friday into Saturday. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
